+ import React from 'react';
+ 
+ interface GameContainerProps {
+   children: React.ReactNode;
+   className?: string;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ç”¨ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
+  * å…±é€šã®ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã¨ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ã‚’æä¾›
+  */
+ export const GameContainer: React.FC<GameContainerProps> = ({ 
+   children, 
+   className = '' 
+ }) => {

```diff
- 
+ import React from 'react';
+ 
+ interface ButtonProps {
+   children: React.ReactNode;
+   onClick?: () => void;
+   disabled?: boolean;
+   className?: string;
+   variant?: 'primary' | 'secondary';
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * å…±é€šã®ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆ
+  * ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒãƒªã¨ã‚»ã‚«ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªã®ãƒãƒªã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’æä¾›
+  */
+ export const Button: React.FC<ButtonProps> = ({
+   children,
+   onClick,
+   disabled = false,
+   className = '',
+   variant = 'primary'
+ }) => {
+   const baseClasses = 'font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-lg transition-colors duration-200 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed';
+   const variantClasses = variant === 'primary' ? 'btn-primary' : 'btn-secondary';
+ 
+   return (
+     <button
+       onClick={onClick}
+       disabled={disabled}
+       className={`${baseClasses} ${variantClasses} ${className}`}
+     >
+       {children}
+     </button>
+   );
+ }; 
```

æ¬¡ã«ã€çŠ¶æ…‹ç®¡ç†ç”¨ã®ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¢ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ï¼š

```diff
- 
+ import { create } from 'zustand';
+ 
+ interface GameState {
+   score: number;
+   level: number;
+   lives: number;
+   isGameOver: boolean;
+   isGameWon: boolean;
+   currentGameId: string | null;
+ }
+ 
+ interface GameActions {
+   updateScore: (score: number) => void;
+   addScore: (points: number) => void;
+   setLevel: (level: number) => void;
+   loseLife: () => void;
+   gainLife: () => void;
+   setGameOver: (isOver: boolean) => void;
+   setGameWon: (isWon: boolean) => void;
+   setCurrentGame: (gameId: string | null) => void;
+   resetGame: () => void;
+ }
+ 
+ type GameStore = GameState & GameActions;
+ 
+ const initialState: GameState = {
+   score: 0,
+   level: 1,
+   lives: 3,
+   isGameOver: false,
+   isGameWon: false,
+   currentGameId: null,
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ çŠ¶æ…‹ç®¡ç†ç”¨ã®Zustandã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¢
+  * ã‚¹ã‚³ã‚¢ã€ãƒ¬ãƒ™ãƒ«ã€ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ•ãªã©ã®å…±é€šã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’ç®¡ç†
+  */
+ export const useGameStore = create<GameStore>((set) => ({
+   ...initialState,
+ 
+   updateScore: (score) => set({ score }),
+   
+   addScore: (points) => set((state) => ({ 
+     score: state.score + points 
+   })),
+   
+   setLevel: (level) => set({ level }),
+   
+   loseLife: () => set((state) => {
+     const newLives = state.lives - 1;
+     return {
+       lives: newLives,
+       isGameOver: newLives <= 0
+     };
+   }),
+   
+   gainLife: () => set((state) => ({ 
+     lives: state.lives + 1 
+   })),
+   
+   setGameOver: (isGameOver) => set({ isGameOver }),
+   
+   setGameWon: (isGameWon) => set({ isGameWon }),
+   
+   setCurrentGame: (currentGameId) => set({ currentGameId }),
+   
+   resetGame: () => set(initialState),
+ })); 
```

+ import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
+ 
+ interface PhaserVaccineGameProps {
+   onBack: () => void;
+ }
+ 
+ export const PhaserVaccineGame: React.FC<PhaserVaccineGameProps> = ({ onBack }) => {
+   const gameRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
+ 
+   useEffect(() => {
+     if (!gameRef.current) return;
+ 
+     const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
+     canvas.width = 800;
+     canvas.height = 600;
+     canvas.style.border = '2px solid #333';
+     canvas.style.borderRadius = '8px';
+     gameRef.current.appendChild(canvas);
+ 
+     const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d')!;
+     
+     let score = 0;
+     let timeLeft = 60;
+     let level = 1;
+     let animals: Array<{
+       x: number;
+       y: number;
+       type: 'cat' | 'dog' | 'rabbit';
+       emoji: string;
+       isDragging: boolean;
+       speed: number;
+       direction: number;
+     }> = [];
+     
+     let vaccines = [
+       { x: 150, y: 450, type: 'cat', emoji: 'ğŸ’‰', label: 'çŒ«ç”¨' },
+       { x: 400, y: 450, type: 'dog', emoji: 'ğŸ’Š', label: 'çŠ¬ç”¨' },
+       { x: 650, y: 450, type: 'rabbit', emoji: 'ğŸ’‰', label: 'ã†ã•ãç”¨' }
+     ];
+ 
+     let draggingAnimal: any = null;
+     let mouseX = 0;
+     let mouseY = 0;
+ 
+     canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
+       const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
+       mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
+       mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;
+       
+       for (let animal of animals) {
+         if (mouseX > animal.x - 40 && mouseX < animal.x + 40 &&
+             mouseY > animal.y - 30 && mouseY < animal.y + 30) {
+           draggingAnimal = animal;
+           animal.isDragging = true;
+           break;
+         }
+       }
+     });
+ 
+     canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
+       const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
+       mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
+       mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;
+       
+       if (draggingAnimal) {
+         draggingAnimal.x = mouseX;
+         draggingAnimal.y = mouseY;
+       }
+     });
+ 
+     canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', () => {
+       if (draggingAnimal) {
+         for (let vaccine of vaccines) {
+           if (mouseX > vaccine.x - 50 && mouseX < vaccine.x + 50 &&
+               mouseY > vaccine.y - 50 && mouseY < vaccine.y + 50) {
+             
+             if (draggingAnimal.type === vaccine.type) {
+               score += 100 + (level * 10);
+               animals = animals.filter(a => a !== draggingAnimal);
+               showEffect(vaccine.x, vaccine.y, 'âœ… +' + (100 + level * 10), '#00ff00');
+             } else {
+               score = Math.max(0, score - 25);
+               showEffect(vaccine.x, vaccine.y, 'âŒ -25', '#ff0000');
+               draggingAnimal.y = 200;
+             }
+             break;
+           }
+         }
+         
+         draggingAnimal.isDragging = false;
+         draggingAnimal = null;
+       }
+     });
+ 
+     let effects: Array<{
+       x: number;
+       y: number;
+       text: string;
+       color: string;
+       time: number;
+     }> = [];
+ 
+     function showEffect(x: number, y: number, text: string, color: string) {
+       effects.push({ x, y, text, color, time: 60 });
+     }
+ 
+     function spawnAnimal() {
+       if (animals.length < 3) {
+         const types = [
+           { type: 'cat' as const, emoji: 'ğŸ±' },
+           { type: 'dog' as const, emoji: 'ğŸ¶' },
+           { type: 'rabbit' as const, emoji: 'ğŸ°' }
+         ];
+         const animal = types[Math.floor(Math.random() * types.length)];
+         
+         animals.push({
+           x: Math.random() * 600 + 100,
+           y: 200,
+           type: animal.type,
+           emoji: animal.emoji,
+           isDragging: false,
+           speed: 0.5 + Math.random() * 0.5,
+           direction: Math.random() * Math.PI * 2
+         });
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     function gameLoop() {
+       ctx.fillStyle = '#87CEEB';
+       ctx.fillRect(0, 0, 800, 600);
+       
+       ctx.fillStyle = '#ffffff';
+       ctx.font = 'bold 24px Arial';
+       ctx.textAlign = 'center';
+       ctx.fillText('ğŸ¥ ãƒ¯ã‚¯ãƒãƒ³æ•‘æ€¥ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼', 400, 40);
+       
+       ctx.textAlign = 'left';
+       ctx.font = '18px Arial';
+       ctx.fillText(`ã‚¹ã‚³ã‚¢: ${score}`, 20, 80);
+       ctx.textAlign = 'center';
+       ctx.fillText(`æ™‚é–“: ${timeLeft}ç§’`, 400, 80);
+       ctx.textAlign = 'right';
+       ctx.fillText(`ãƒ¬ãƒ™ãƒ«: ${level}`, 780, 80);
+       
+       ctx.fillStyle = '#F0F8FF';
+       ctx.globalAlpha = 0.8;
+       ctx.fillRect(50, 200, 700, 250);
+       ctx.globalAlpha = 1;
+       
+       ctx.fillStyle = '#333333';
+       ctx.font = '16px Arial';
+       ctx.textAlign = 'center';
+       ctx.fillText('å‹•ç‰©ã‚’å¯¾å¿œã™ã‚‹ãƒ¯ã‚¯ãƒãƒ³ã¾ã§ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚°ã—ã‚ˆã†ï¼', 400, 130);
+       ctx.fillText('çŒ«â†’ğŸ’‰  çŠ¬â†’ğŸ’Š  ã†ã•ãâ†’ğŸ’‰', 400, 520);
+       
+       for (let vaccine of vaccines) {
+         ctx.fillStyle = '#ffffff';
+         ctx.fillRect(vaccine.x - 50, vaccine.y - 30, 100, 60);
+         ctx.strokeStyle = '#333333';
+         ctx.lineWidth = 2;
+         ctx.strokeRect(vaccine.x - 50, vaccine.y - 30, 100, 60);
+         
+         ctx.font = '30px Arial';
+         ctx.textAlign = 'center';
+         ctx.fillText(vaccine.emoji, vaccine.x, vaccine.y + 5);
+         
+         ctx.font = '14px Arial';
+         ctx.fillStyle = '#666666';
+         ctx.fillText(vaccine.label, vaccine.x, vaccine.y + 25);
+       }
+       
+       for (let animal of animals) {
+         if (!animal.isDragging) {
+           animal.x += Math.cos(animal.direction) * animal.speed;
+           animal.y += Math.sin(animal.direction) * animal.speed;
+           
+           if (animal.x < 100 || animal.x > 700) {
+             animal.direction = Math.PI - animal.direction;
+           }
+           if (animal.y < 220 || animal.y > 350) {
+             animal.direction = -animal.direction;
+           }
+           
+           if (Math.random() < 0.01) {
+             animal.direction += (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5;
+           }
+         }
+         
+         ctx.font = '40px Arial';
+         ctx.textAlign = 'center';
+         
+         const blinkTime = Math.floor(Date.now() / 500) % 2;
+         if (blinkTime === 0) {
+           ctx.globalAlpha = 0.7;
+         }
+         
+         ctx.fillText(animal.emoji, animal.x, animal.y);
+         ctx.globalAlpha = 1;
+         
+         ctx.font = '20px Arial';
+         ctx.fillText('ğŸ˜·', animal.x + 25, animal.y - 20);
+       }
+       
+       effects = effects.filter(effect => {
+         effect.time--;
+         effect.y -= 1;
+         
+         ctx.font = 'bold 20px Arial';
+         ctx.fillStyle = effect.color;
+         ctx.textAlign = 'center';
+         ctx.globalAlpha = effect.time / 60;
+         ctx.fillText(effect.text, effect.x, effect.y);
+         ctx.globalAlpha = 1;
+         
+         return effect.time > 0;
+       });
+       
+       if (score >= level * 500) {
+         level++;
+         showEffect(400, 300, 'ğŸ‰ ãƒ¬ãƒ™ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ï¼', '#FFD700');
+       }
+       
+       requestAnimationFrame(gameLoop);
+     }
+ 
+     const timer = setInterval(() => {
+       timeLeft--;
+       
+       if (timeLeft <= 0) {
+         gameOver();
+       }
+       
+       if (Math.random() < 0.02) {
+         spawnAnimal();
+       }
+     }, 1000);
+ 
+     function gameOver() {
+       clearInterval(timer);
+       
+       ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)';
+       ctx.fillRect(0, 0, 800, 600);
+       
+       ctx.fillStyle = '#ffffff';
+       ctx.font = 'bold 48px Arial';
+       ctx.textAlign = 'center';
+       ctx.fillText('ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ çµ‚äº†ï¼', 400, 250);
+       
+       ctx.font = '32px Arial';
+       ctx.fillText(`æœ€çµ‚ã‚¹ã‚³ã‚¢: ${score}`, 400, 320);
+       ctx.fillText(`åˆ°é”ãƒ¬ãƒ™ãƒ«: ${level}`, 400, 370);
+       
+       ctx.font = '20px Arial';
+       ctx.fillText('ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¦å†é–‹', 400, 450);
+       
+       canvas.addEventListener('click', () => {
+         location.reload();
+       });
+     }
+ 
+     function startGame() {
+       spawnAnimal();
+       gameLoop();
+     }
+ 
+     setTimeout(startGame, 1000);
+ 
+     return () => {
+       clearInterval(timer);
+       if (gameRef.current && canvas.parentNode) {
+         gameRef.current.removeChild(canvas);
+       }
+     };
+   }, []);
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="flex flex-col items-center p-6">
+       <div className="flex items-center gap-4 mb-6">
+         <button
+           onClick={onBack}
+           className="px-4 py-2 bg-gray-500 text-white rounded hover:bg-gray-600"
+         >
+           â† æˆ»ã‚‹
+         </button>
+         <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">ğŸ¥ ãƒ¯ã‚¯ãƒãƒ³æ•‘æ€¥ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼</h1>
+       </div>
+       
+       <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
+         <div ref={gameRef}></div>
+       </div>
+       
+       <div className="mt-4 text-center text-gray-600">
+         <p>ğŸ¯ å‹•ç‰©ã‚’æ­£ã—ã„ãƒ¯ã‚¯ãƒãƒ³ã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ã«ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚°ã—ã¦æ•‘ãŠã†ï¼</p>
+         <p>â° 60ç§’ä»¥å†…ã«ã§ãã‚‹ã ã‘å¤šãã®å‹•ç‰©ã‚’æ²»ç™‚ã—ã‚ˆã†</p>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   );
+ }; 
```

+ ```typescript
+ interface Animal {
+   x: number;
+   y: number;
+   type: string;
+   emoji: string;
+   isDragging: boolean;
+   speed: number;
+   direction: number;
+ }
+ 
+ function moveAnimals(animals: Animal[], scale: number) {
+   animals.forEach(animal => {
+     if (!animal.isDragging) {
+       animal.x += Math.cos(animal.direction) * animal.speed;
+       animal.y += Math.sin(animal.direction) * animal.speed;
+       
+       // å¢ƒç•Œãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
+       if (animal.x < 100 * scale || animal.x > 700 * scale) {
+         animal.direction = Math.PI - animal.direction;
+       }
+     }
+   });
+ }
+ ```

+ ### ã‚¨ãƒ•ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ 
+ ```typescript
+ interface Effect {
+   x: number;
+   y: number;
+   text: string;
+   color: string;
+   time: number;
+ }
+ 
+ function updateEffects(effects: Effect[], ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D, scale: number) {
+   return effects.filter(effect => {
+     effect.time--;
+     effect.y -= 1 * scale;
+     
+     ctx.font = `bold ${20 * scale}px Arial`;
+     ctx.fillStyle = effect.color;
+     ctx.globalAlpha = effect.time / 60;
+     ctx.fillText(effect.text, effect.x, effect.y);
+     ctx.globalAlpha = 1;
+     
+     return effect.time > 0;
+   });
+ }
+ ```

// ãƒã‚¦ã‚¹ãƒ»ã‚¿ãƒƒãƒä¸¡å¯¾å¿œã®çµ±ä¸€é–¢æ•°
function getEventPos(e: MouseEvent | TouchEvent) {
  const clientX = 'touches' in e ? e.touches[0].clientX : e.clientX;
  const clientY = 'touches' in e ? e.touches[0].clientY : e.clientY;
  return { x: clientX - rect.left, y: clientY - rect.top };
}
```

package.jsonã«GitHub Pagesãƒ‡ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¤ç”¨ã®ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’è¿½åŠ ï¼š

GitHub Actionsãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

---

```diff
- 
+ name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
+ 
+ on:
+   push:
+     branches: [ main ]
+   pull_request:
+     branches: [ main ]
+ 
+ jobs:
+   build-and-deploy:
+     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+     
+     steps:
+     - name: Checkout
+       uses: actions/checkout@v4
+       
+     - name: Setup Node.js
+       uses: actions/setup-node@v4
+       with:
+         node-version: '18'
+         cache: 'npm'
+         
+     - name: Install dependencies
+       run: npm ci
+       
+     - name: Build
+       run: npm run build
+       env:
+         NODE_ENV: production
+         
+     - name: Setup Pages
+       uses: actions/configure-pages@v4
+       
+     - name: Upload artifact
+       uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
+       with:
+         path: ./dist
+         
+     - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
+       id: deployment
+       uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
+ 
+ # Grant GITHUB_TOKEN the permissions required to make a Pages deployment
+ permissions:
+   contents: read
+   pages: write
+   id-token: write
+ 
+ # Allow only one concurrent deployment, skipping runs queued between the run in-progress and latest queued.
+ # However, do NOT cancel in-progress runs as we want to allow these production deployments to complete.
+ concurrency:
+   group: "pages"
+   cancel-in-progress: false 
```

+ # Grant GITHUB_TOKEN the permissions required to make a Pages deployment
+ permissions:
+   contents: read
+   pages: write
+   id-token: write
+ 
+ # Allow only one concurrent deployment, skipping runs queued between the run in-progress and latest queued.
+ # However, do NOT cancel in-progress runs as we want to allow these production deployments to complete.
+ concurrency:
+   group: "pages"
+   cancel-in-progress: false
+ 
  jobs:
    build-and-deploy:
